Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.alloc.web

Interface SystemController

All Known Implementing Classes:
SystemControllerImpl
@RequestMapping("/system")
public interface SystemController
The main web interface controller.
Author:
Donal Fellows

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static String ROOT_PATH
    The root path to the controller within the overall application.
    static String USER_MAY_CHANGE_PASSWORD
    The name of the boolean view attribute describing whether the password change form may be used.
    static String USER_PASSWORD_CHANGE_ATTR
    The name of the main attribute supporting a password change form.

  • Field Details

    • ROOT_PATH

      static final String ROOT_PATH
      The root path to the controller within the overall application.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • USER_PASSWORD_CHANGE_ATTR

      static final String USER_PASSWORD_CHANGE_ATTR
      The name of the main attribute supporting a password change form.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • USER_MAY_CHANGE_PASSWORD

      static final String USER_MAY_CHANGE_PASSWORD
      The name of the boolean view attribute describing whether the password change form may be used. Only local users may change their password!
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • index

      @GetMapping("/") org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView index()
      Get the view for the main page of the service.
      Returns:
      View name

    • getMachineList

      @GetMapping("/list_machines") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'READER\')") org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getMachineList()
      Get the view for the general machine list.
      Returns:
      View and model

    • getMachineInfo

      @GetMapping("/machine_info/{machine}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'READER\')") org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getMachineInfo​(@PathVariable("machine") String machine)
      Get the view for some machine details.
      Parameters:
      machine - Which machine is being asked for
      Returns:
      View and model

    • getJobList

      @GetMapping("/list_jobs") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'READER\')") org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getJobList()
      Get the view for the general job list.
      Returns:
      View and model

    • getJobInfo

      @GetMapping("/job_info/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'READER\')") org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getJobInfo​(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Get the view for some job details.
      Parameters:
      id - Which job is being asked for
      Returns:
      View and model

    • getPasswordChangeForm

      @GetMapping("/change_password") org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getPasswordChangeForm​(Principal principal)
      Get the view and model for the password change form.
      Parameters:
      principal - Who is changing their password.
      Returns:
      View and model

    • postPasswordChangeForm

      @PostMapping("/change_password") org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView postPasswordChangeForm​(@ModelAttribute("user") @Valid @Valid PasswordChangeRecord user, Principal principal)
      Carry out a password change.
      Parameters:
      user - The description of what to change.
      principal - Who is changing their password.
      Returns:
      View and model

    • performLogout

      @GetMapping("/perform_logout") String performLogout​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Log the user out.
      Parameters:
      request - What request was made
      response - What response to build
      Returns:
      Redirect to the login page
      See Also:
      LogoutHandler
